page.title: 05COMMUNITY AFFAIRS
page.content: {a) LOCAL ROAD ACCIDENTS:} WE LOOKED INTO THE INCIDENCE OF ACCIDENTS IN OUR AREA.69 ACCIDENTS OCCURRED IN 1984.OF THESE TWO (6-11yr olds) 11(12-18); 16(19-25); 28(26-50) 12 WERE OVER THE AGE OF 50.MOST OF THEM WERE CAUSED BY CARS.ONE MAN HAD HIS SEATBELT JAMMED AND HE COULDN'T GET OUT WHEN HIS CAR OVERTURNED.ONE WAS SERIOUS WHERE A GIRL,WAS HIT BY A CAR NEAR OUR SCHOOL.MOST PEOPLE WHO DIED WERE MEN (ORD.REF.NO.0544-47).{b)THE GOLDEN {HIND HOTEL: MRS.BROWN,}THE LANDLADY OF THE{GOLDEN HIND}SAID THAT ALTHOUGH IT IS CALLED A HOTEL,THEY HAVE NEVER ACTUALLY HAD PEOPLE STAY THERE OVERNIGHT.SHE WAS UNABLE TO TELL US THE EXACT AMOUNT OF BEER,WINES OR SPIRITS SOLD THERE.{GOLDEN HIND}HAS BEEN OPEN FOR 47 YEARS,BUT THE PRESENT LANDLADY HAS ONLY BEEN THERE 2 YEARS.
